text: Red Bluff Creek is a stream in Bandera and Kendall counties, Texas, in the United States. Red Bluff Creek was so named from the reddish steep banks along the creek. ==See also== *List of rivers of Texas ==References== Category:Rivers of Bandera County, Texas Category:Rivers of Kendall County, Texas Category:Rivers of Texas
title: Red Bluff Creek (Medina River tributary)
